CmdLine: set -x &&     yum install -y https://centos7.iuscommunity.org/ius-release.rpm && yum update -y --exclude='ansible*' &&     yum install -y git jq python2-pip tree unzip wget &&     rm -rf /var/cache/yum/* && yum clean all &&     pip install --upgrade pip &&     pip install ansible-lint awscli boto pywinrm yamllint &&     mkdir -p /etc/ansible && chmod 755 /etc/ansible
Commands.Name: run
